original: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Saṃyuttanikāye
analyzed: saṃyutta nikāye

original: Sagāthāvaggaṭīkā
analyzed: sa gāthā vagga ṭīkā

original: Ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: gantha ārambha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1. Saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayavandanā saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa pabhavanissayavisuddhipaṭivedanatthaṃ,
analyzed: saṃvaṇṇanā ārambhe ratana taya vandanā saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa pabhava nissaya visuddhi paṭivedana attham

original: taṃ pana dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthaṃ, taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya
analyzed: tam pana dhamma saṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnam bahu māna uppādana attham tam sammat eva tesam uggahaṇa dhāraṇa ādi kama laddhabbāya

original: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthanti. Atha vā maṅgalabhāvato, sabbakiriyāsu
analyzed: sammā paṭipattiyā sabba hita sukha nipphādana tthanti atha vā maṅgala bhāvataḥ sabba kiriyāsu

original: pubbakiccabhāvato, paṇḍitehi samācaritabhāvato, āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato
analyzed: pubba kicca bhāvataḥ paṇḍitehi samācarita bhāvataḥ āyatim paresam diṭṭha anugati āpajjanato

original: ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyāti. Atha vā ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ pūjanīyapūjāpuññavisesanibbattanatthaṃ,
analyzed: ca saṃvaṇṇanā ayam ratana ttaya paṇāma kiriyā ati atha vā ratana ttaya paṇāma karaṇam pūjanīya pūjā puñña visesa nibbattana attham

original: taṃ attano yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa kammassa balānuppadānatthaṃ, antarā ca
analyzed: tam attanaḥ yathā laddha sampatti nimittakassa kammassa bala an uppadāna attham antarā ca

original: tassa asaṃkocāpanatthaṃ, tadubhayaṃ anantarāyena aṭṭhakathāya parisamāpanatthanti
analyzed: tassa a saṃkoca āpana tham tat ubhayam anantarāyena aṭṭhakathāya parisamāpana tham ti

original: idameva ca payojanaṃ ācariyena idhādhippetaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “iti me pasannamatino…pe…
analyzed: idam eva ca payojanam ācariyena idha adhippetam tathā hi vakkhati iti me pasanna matinā upe

original: tassānubhāvenā”ti. Vatthuttayapūjā hi niratisayapuññakkhettasaṃbuddhiyā aparimeyyapabhāvo
analyzed: tassa anubhāvena ati vatthuttaya pūjā hi niratisaya puñña kkhetta saṃbuddhiyāḥ aparimeyya pabhāvaḥ

original: puññātisayoti bahuvidhantarāyepi lokasannivāse antarāyanibandhanasakalasaṃkilesaviddhaṃsanāya
analyzed: bahuvidha antarāye api loka sannivāse antarāya nibandhana sakala saṃkilesa viddhaṃsanāya

original: pahoti, bhayādiupaddavañca nivāreti. Yathāha “pūjārahe pūjayato”tiādi, tathā “ye,
analyzed: bhaya ādi upaddavam ca nivāra iti yathā āha pūjā rahe pūjayatā itiādi tathā ye

original: bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā, agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”tiādi.
analyzed: bhikkhave buddhe pasannāḥ agge te pasannāḥ agge kho pana pasannānam aggaḥ vipākaḥ hoti itiādi

original: “Buddhoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
analyzed: buddhā uti kittayantassa kāye bhavati yā pi iti

original: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa;
analyzed: varam eva hi sā kasiṇena api jambudīpassa

original: Dhammoti…pe…, saṅghoti…pe…, jambudīpassā”ti. ;
analyzed: dhamma utipe saṅgha utipe jambudīpassa ati

original: Tathā “yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ
analyzed: tathā yasmin mahānāma samaye ariya sāvakaḥ tathāgatam anussarati na iva assa tasmin

original: samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hotī”tiādi.
analyzed: samaye rāga pariyuṭṭhitam cittam hoti na dosape na moha pariyuṭṭhitam cittam hoti itiādi

original: “Araññe rukkhamūle vā…pe… bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso na hessatī”ti ca.
analyzed: araññe rukkha mūle vāpe bhayam vā chambhi tattam vā lomahaṃsaḥ na hessati iti ca

original: Tattha yassa vatthuttayassa vandanaṃ kattukāmo, tassa guṇātisayayogasandassanatthaṃ
analyzed: tattha yassa vatthuttayassa vandanam kattu kāmo tassa guṇa atisaya yoga sandassana attham

original: “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādinā gāthattayamāha. Guṇātisayayogena hi vandanārahabhāvo,
analyzed: guṇa ati saya yogena hi

original: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetaṃ payojanaṃ sādhetīti. Tattha yassā desanāya
analyzed: vandanā rahe ca katā vandanā yathā adhippetam payojanam sādheti iti tattha yassā desanāya

original: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, sā na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā, nāpi abhidhammadesanā
analyzed: saṃvaṇṇanam kattu kāmo sā na vinaya desanā viya karuṇā ppadhānā na api abhidhamma desanā

original: viya paññāppadhānā, atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva tāva sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: paññā appadhānā atha kho karuṇā paññā appadhānā ti tad ubhaya ppadhānam eva tāva sammāsambuddhassa

original: thomanaṃ kātuṃ tammūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: thomanam kātum sesa ratanānam vuttam tattha

original: kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Atha vā kiṇātīti karuṇā,
analyzed: kirati iti karuṇā para dukkham vikkhipati apaneti iti atthaḥ atha vā kiṇāti iti karuṇā

original: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ
analyzed: para dukkhe sati kāruṇikam hiṃsati vibādhati iti attho para dukkhe sati sādhūnam kampanam

original: hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā. Esā
analyzed: hadaya khedam karoti iti vā karuṇā atha vā kam iti sukham tam rundhati iti karuṇā esā

original: hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati
analyzed: hi para dukkha apanayana kāma tā lakkhaṇā atta sukha nirapekkha tāya kāruṇikānam sukham rundhati

original: vibandhatīti attho. Karuṇāya sītalaṃ karuṇāsītalaṃ, karuṇāsītalaṃ hadayaṃ assāti
analyzed: vibandhati iti karuṇāya sītalam karuṇā sītalam karuṇā sītalam hadayam assa ati

original: karuṇāsītalahadayo, taṃ karuṇāsītalahadayaṃ.
analyzed: tam karuṇā sīta lahadayam

original: Tattha kiñcāpi paresaṃ hitopasaṃhārasukhādiaparihānicchanasabhāvatāya, byāpādāratīnaṃ
analyzed: kiñca api paresam hita upasaṃhāra sukha ādi a parihāni chana sabhāva tāya byāpāda aratīnam

original: ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca sattasantānagatasantāpavicchedanākārapavattiyā mettāmuditānampi
analyzed: uju vipaccanīka tāya ca satta santāna gata santāpa vicchedana ākāra pavattiyā

original: cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā upalabbhati, tathāpi paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattiyā parūpatāpāsahanarasā
analyzed: citta sītala bhāva kāraṇa tā upalabbhati tathā api para dukkha apanayana ākāra ppavattiyā parūpa tāpa āsahana rasā

original: avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇāva visesena bhagavato cittassa cittapassaddhi viya sītibhāvanimittanti
analyzed: avihiṃsā bhūtā visesena bhagavato cittassa citta passaddhi viya sīti bhāva nimittanti

original: vuttaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti. Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: vuttam karuṇā sītala hadayanti karuṇā mukhena vā mettā muditānam pi hadaya sītala bhāva kāraṇa tā vuttā iti daṭṭhabbā

original: Atha vā chaasādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
analyzed: atha vā sa atisayam niravasesam ca sabbaññuta ññāṇam

original: viya savisayabyāpitāya mahākaruṇābhāvamupagatā karuṇāva bhagavato abhisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti
analyzed: sa visaya byāpitāya mahā karuṇā bhāvam upagatā bhagavataḥ abhisayena hadaya sītala bhāva hetu uti

original: āha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti.
analyzed: āha

original: Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ sātisaye hadayasītibhāvanibandhanatte sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya
analyzed: atha vā satipi sa atisaye sakala buddha guṇa visesa kāraṇatāya

original: tāsampi kāraṇanti karuṇāva bhagavato “hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇa”nti vuttā. Karuṇānidānā
analyzed: tāsam pi kāraṇanti vuttā karuṇā nidānā

original: hi sabbepi buddhaguṇā, karuṇānubhāvanibbāpiyamānasaṃsāradukkhasantāpassa hi bhagavato
analyzed: hi sabbe api buddha guṇā karuṇā anubhāva nibbāpiyamāna saṃsāra dukkha santāpassa hi bhagavato

original: paradukkhāpanayanakāmatāya anekānipi asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ akilantarūpasseva niravasesabuddhakaradhammasambharaṇaniyatassa
analyzed: para dukkha apanayana kāma tāya anekāni api asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānam a kilanta rūpassa iva niravasesa buddha kara dhamma sambharaṇa niyatassa

original: samadhigatadhammādhipateyyassa ca sannihitesupi sattasaṅghāṭasamupanītahadayūpatāpanimittesu
analyzed: samadhigata dhamma ādhipateyyassa ca sannihitesu pi satta saṅghāṭa samupanīta hadaya upatāpa nimittesu

original: na īsakampi cittasītibhāvassa aññathattamahosīti. Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu
analyzed: na īsakam pi citta sīti bhāvassa aññathattam ahosi iti etasmin ca attha vikappe tīsu pi avatthāsu

original: bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitā iti daṭṭhabbā

original: Pajānātīti paññā, yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato
analyzed: pajānāti iti paññā yathā sabhāvam pakārehi paṭivijjhati iti attho paññā va ñeyya āvaraṇa pahānato

original: pakārehi dhammasabhāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto. Savāsanappahānato visesena
analyzed: pakārehi dhamma sabhāva jotana ṭṭhena pajjoto ti paññāpajjoto sa vāsanā pahānataḥ visesena

original: hataṃ samugghāṭitaṃ vihataṃ. Paññāpajjotena vihataṃ paññāpajjotavihataṃ. Muyhanti
analyzed: hatam samugghāṭitam vihatam paññāpajjotena vihatam paññāpajjota vihatam muyhanti

original: tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, mohanamattameva vā tanti moho, avijjā. Sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanakaraṇato
analyzed: tena sayam vā muyhati mohana mattam eva vā mohaḥ avijjā svā iva visaya sabhāva paṭicchādana karaṇato

original: andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti tamo. Paññāpajjotavihato mohatamo etassāti paññāpajjotavihatamohatamo,
analyzed: andhakāra sa rikkha tāya tamaḥ viyā ati tamo paññā pajjota vihataḥ moha tamo etassa ati paññā pajjota vihata moha tamo

original: taṃ paññāpajjotavihatamohatamaṃ. Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpajjotena
analyzed: tam paññāpajjota vihata mohatamam sabbesam pi hi khīṇāsavānam sati pi paññāpajjotena

original: avijjandhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhādhimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi
analyzed: avijja andhakārassa vihata bhāve saddhā adhimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānam sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi

original: ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatīti sātisayena
analyzed: ca sa vāsanā pahānena sammāsambuddhānam kilesa ppahānassa visesaḥ vijjati iti sa atisayena

original: avijjāppahānena bhagavantaṃ thomento āha “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
analyzed: avijjā ppahānena bhagavantam thomentaḥ āha paññā pajja uta vihata moha taman ti

original: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
analyzed: atha vā antarena para upadesam attano santāne accantam avijja andhakāra vigamassa

original: tathā sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā, parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena
analyzed: tathā sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigata ttā para santatiyam ca dhamma desanā atisaya anubhāvena

original: sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena thometabboti āha
analyzed: sammat eva tassa pavatti tattā bhagavā ava visesataḥ moha tama vigamena thometabbaḥ iti āha

original: “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti. Imasmiñca atthavikappe “paññāpajjoto”ti padena bhagavato
analyzed: imasmin ca attha vikappe paññāpajjota uti padena bhagavataḥ

original: paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: paṭivedha paññā viya desanā paññā api sāmañña niddesena ekasesa nayena vā saṅgahitā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Atha vā bhagavato ñāṇassa ñeyyapariyantikattā sakalañeyyadhammasabhāvāvabodhanasamatthena
analyzed: atha vā bhagavataḥ ñāṇassa ñeyya pariyantika ttā sakala ñeyya dhamma sabhāva avabodhana samatthena

original: anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātena paññāpajjotena sabbañeyyadhammasabhāvacchādakassa mohandhakārassa
analyzed: anāvaraṇa ñāṇa saṅkhātena paññāpajjotena sabba ñeyya dhamma sabhā avacchādakassa moha ndhakārassa

original: vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato mohatamavināsoti katvā vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
analyzed: vidhamita ttā anañña sādhāraṇaḥ bhagavataḥ moha tama vināsaḥ ti katvā vuttam paññāpajja uta vihata moha taman ti

original: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena sasantāne
analyzed: ettha ca moha tama vidham anante adhigata ttā anāvaraṇa ñāṇam kāraṇa upacārena sa santāne

original: mohatamavidhamananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhinīhārasampattiyā savāsanappahānameva hi kilesānaṃ
analyzed: mohatama vidhamananti daṭṭhabbam abhinīhāra sampattiyā sa vāsanā pahānam eva hi kilesānam

original: ñeyyāvaraṇapahānanti, parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato phalūpacārena
analyzed: ñeyya āvaraṇa pahānanti para santāne pana moha tama vidhamanassa kāraṇa bhāvato phala upacārena

original: anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ “mohatamavidhamana”nti vuccatīti.
analyzed: anāvaraṇa ñāṇam moha tama vidham ananti vuccati iti

original: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ
analyzed: kim pana kāraṇam pahāna sampatti vasena bhagavataḥ thomanā nimittam

original: gayhati, na pana sātisayaṃ niravasesakilesapahānanti? Tappahānavacaneneva tadekaṭṭhatāya
analyzed: gayhati na pana sa atisayam niravasesa kilesa pahānan ti tad pahāna vacanena iva tad ekaṭṭhatāya

original: sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghātassa jotitabhāvato. Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi, yo
analyzed: sakala saṃkilesa gaṇa samugghātassa jotita bhāvataḥ na hi so tādisaḥ kileso atthi yaḥ

original: niravasesaavijjāppahānena na pahīyatīti.
analyzed: niravasesa avijjā pahānena na pahīyati iti

original: Atha vā vijjā viya sakalakusaladhammasamuppattiyā niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā
analyzed: atha vā vijjā viya sakala kusala dhamma samuppattiyā niravasesa akusala dhamma nibbattiyā

original: saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto
analyzed: saṃsāra ppavattiyā ca avijjā padhāna kāraṇan ti tad bighāta vacanena sakala saṃkilesa gaṇa samugghātaḥ

original: vutto eva hotīti vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
analyzed: vuttaḥ eva hoti iti vuttam

original: Narā ca amarā ca narāmarā, saha narāmarehīti sanarāmaro, sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti
analyzed: narā ca amarā ca nara amarā saha nara amara ihi iti sa nara amaraḥ sa nara amaraḥ ca saḥ lokaḥ ca ati

original: sanarāmaraloko, tassa garūti sanarāmaralokagaru, taṃ sanarāmaralokagaruṃ. Etena devamanussānaṃ
analyzed: sa nara amara lokaḥ tassa garu uti sa nara amara loka garu tam sa nara amara loka garum etena deva manussānam

original: viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato upakārataṃ dasseti.
analyzed: viya tad avasiṭṭha sattānam pi yathāraham guṇa visesa āvahatāya bhagavataḥ upakāra tam dasseti

original: Na cettha padhānāppadhānabhāvo codetabbo. Añño hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamo. Edisesu
analyzed: na ca ittha padhāna appadhāna bhāvaḥ codetabbaḥ aññaḥ hi sadda kkamaḥ aññaḥ attha kkamaḥ edisesu

original: hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti.
analyzed: hi samāsa padesu padhānam pi appadhānam viya niddisīyati yathā sa rājikāya parisāya ati

original: Kāmañcettha sattasaṅkhārokāsavasena tividho loko, garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā
analyzed: kāmañca ittha satta saṅkhāra ukāsa vasena tividhaḥ lokaḥ garu bhāvassa pana adhippeta ttā

original: garukaraṇasamatthasseva sattalokassa vasena attho gahetabbo. So hi lokīyanti ettha
analyzed: garu karaṇa samatthassa iva satta lokassa vasena atthaḥ gahetabbaḥ saḥ hi lokīyanti ettha

original: puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati. Amaraggahaṇena cettha upapattidevā adhippetā.
analyzed: puñña pāpāni tad vipāko ca ati loko ti vuccati amara ggahaṇena ca ittha upapatti devāḥ adhippetā

original: Atha vā samūhattho loka-saddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti. Saha narehīti
analyzed: atha vā samūha atthaḥ loka saddo samudāya vasena lokīyati paññāpīyati iti saha narehi iti

original: sanarā, sanarā ca te amarā cāti sanarāmarā, tesaṃ lokoti sanarāmaralokoti purimanayeneva
analyzed: sa narā sa narā ca te amarā ca ati sa nara amarā tesam loka uti sa nara amara loka uti purima nayena iva

original: yojetabbaṃ. Amara-saddena cettha visuddhidevāpi saṅgayhanti. Te hi maraṇābhāvato
analyzed: yojetabbam amara saddena ca ittha visuddhi devā api saṅgayhanti te hi maraṇa abhāvato

original: paramatthato amarā, narāmarānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.

original: karuṇāgahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti. Karuṇānidānañhi

original: ekantena karaṇīyanti dasseti. Tenevāha “dīpavāsīnamatthāyā”ti. Ettha dīpavāsīnanti

original: 8. Apanetvāti kañcukasadisaṃ sīhaḷabhāsaṃ apanetvā. Tatoti aṭṭhakathāto. Ahanti attānaṃ
analyzed: apanetvā iti kañcuka sadisam sīhaḷa bhāsam apanetvā tatas ti aṭṭhakathātaḥ aham ti attānam

original: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti yojetabbaṃ. Etena mahākassapāditheraparamparāgato,

original: tato eva ca aviparīto saṇho sukhumo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayo, tassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ dasseti.

original: Katame dve? Sunikkhittañca padabyañjanaṃ attho ca sunīto”ti.

original: 11-12. Yaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, tassā mahattaṃ pariharituṃ “sāvatthipabhūtīna”ntiādi

original: 13. “Na idha bhiyyo vitthārakathaṃ karissāmī”ti sāmaññato vuttassa atthassa avassayaṃ dassetuṃ “suttānaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: na idha bhiyyas vitthāra katham karissāmi iti sāmaññataḥ vuttassa atthassa avassayam dassetum suttānam pana atiādi vuttam

original: 15. Lokiyalokuttarabhedā cha abhiññāyo sabbā abhiññāyo. Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā paññāya saṅkaletvā sampiṇḍetvā nicchayo paññāsaṅkalananicchayo.

original: 16. Paccayadhammānaṃ hetuādīnaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ hetupaccayādibhāvo paccayākāro,

analyzed: a visajjetvā ava vicārita ttā a vimutta tanti maggā

original: Atthatoti padatthato. Taṃ pana padatthaṃ atthuddhārakkamena paṭhamaṃ evaṃsaddassa

original: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi “evaṃgatāni puthusippāyatanāni, evaṃvidho evamākāro”ti

original: hi taṃ “idhekacco gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati sahanandī sahasokī”tiādīsu iriyāpathavihāre
analyzed: hi tam idha ekaccaḥ gihīhi saṃsaṭṭhaḥ viharati saha nandī saha sokī iti ādīsu iriyāpatha vihāre

original: āgataṃ. “Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
analyzed: āgatam yasmin bhikkhave samaye bhikkhu vivicca iva paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharatī”ti ettha dibbavihāre. “So mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādīsu
analyzed: viharati iti ettha dibba vihāre saḥ mettā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati itiādīsu

original: brahmavihāre. “So kho ahaṃ, aggivessana, tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃ eva
analyzed: brahmavihāre saḥ kho aham aggivessana tassāya iva kathāya pariyosāne tasmin eva

original: purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi
analyzed: purimasmin samādhi nimitte ajjhattam eva cittam saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodim karomi

original: samādahāmi, yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”tiādīsu ariyavihāre.
analyzed: samādahāmi yena sudam nicca kappam viharāmi itiādīsu ariya vihāre

original: Tattha iriyanaṃ vattanaṃ iriyā, kāyappayogo. Tassā pavattanupāyabhāvato ṭhānādi iriyāpatho.
analyzed: tattha iriyanam vattanam iriyā kāya ppayogo tassā pavattana upāya bhāvataḥ ṭhāna ādi iriyāpathaḥ

original: Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci kareyya gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vā. Atha vā iriyati
analyzed: ṭhāna samaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci kareyya gamana ādīsu aññatara samaṅgī vā atha vā iriyati

original: pavattati etena attabhāvo kāyakiccaṃ vāti iriyā, tassā pavattiupāyabhāvato iriyā
analyzed: pavattati etena atta bhāvaḥ kāya kiccam vāti iriyā tassā pavatti upāya bhāvataḥ iriyā

original: ca so patho cāti iriyāpatho, ṭhānādi eva. So ca atthato gatinivattiādiākārena pavatto
analyzed: ca saḥ pathaḥ ca ati iriyāpathaḥ ṭhāna ādi eva so ca atthataḥ gati nivatti ādi ākārena pavatto

original: catusantatirūpapabandho eva. Viharaṇaṃ, viharati etenāti vā vihāro, iriyāpatho eva
analyzed: eva viharaṇam viharati etena ati vā vihāraḥ iriyāpathaḥ eva

original: vihāro iriyāpathavihāro. Divi bhavo dibbo, tattha bahulappavattiyā brahmapārisajjādidevaloke
analyzed: vihāraḥ iriyāpatha vihāro divi bhavaḥ dibbaḥ tattha bahula ppavattiyā brahma pārisajja ādi deva loke

original: bhavoti attho. Tattha yo dibbānubhāvo, tadatthāya saṃvattatīti vā dibbo, abhiññābhinīhāravasena
analyzed: bhavaḥ ti attho tattha yaḥ dibba anubhāvo tad atthāya saṃvattati iti vā dibbaḥ abhiññā abhinīhāra vasena

original: mahāgatikattā vā dibbo, dibbo ca so vihāro cāti dibbavihāro, catasso rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo.
analyzed: mahāgatika ttā vā dibbaḥ dibbaḥ ca so vihāro ca ati dibbavihāro catasso rūpāvacara samāpattiyaḥ

original: Āruppasamāpattiyopi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Brahmūnaṃ, brahmāno vā vihārā brahmavihārā,
analyzed: āruppa samāpattiyaḥ pi etthā iva saṅgaham gacchanti brahmūnam brahmānaḥ vā vihārāḥ brahmavihārā

original: catasso appamaññāyo. Ariyānaṃ, ariyā vā vihārā ariyavihārā, cattāri sāmaññaphalāni.
analyzed: catasso appamaññāyaḥ ariyānam ariyāḥ vā vihārāḥ ariya vihārā cattāri sāmañña phalāni

original: So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanantiādi yadipi bhagavā ekenapi iriyāpathena cirataraṃ

original: kālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti, tathāpi upādinnakasarīrassa nāma ayaṃ sabhāvoti
analyzed: kālam atta bhāvam pavattetum sakkoti tathā api upādinnaka sarīrassa nāma ayam sabhāvaḥ ti

original: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā bhagavā yattha katthaci vasanto vineyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento,
analyzed: dassetum vuttam yasmai vā bhagavā yattha katthaci vasantaḥ vineyyānam dhammaṃ desentaḥ

original: nānāsamāpattīhi ca kālaṃ vītināmento vasatīti sattānaṃ attano ca vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ
analyzed: nānā samāpattīhi ca kālam vasati iti sattānam attano ca vividham hita sukham

original: harati upaneti uppādeti, tasmā vividhaṃ haratīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
analyzed: harati upaneti uppādeti tasmai vividham harati iti evam ettha atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Paccatthike jinātīti jeto. Jeta-saddo hi sota-saddo viya kattusādhanopi atthīti.
analyzed: paccatthike jināti iti jetaḥ jeta saddaḥ hi sota saddaḥ viya kattu sādhanaḥ api atthi iti

original: Rañño vā paccatthikānaṃ jitakāle jātattā jeto. Rañño hi attano jayaṃ tattha āropetvā
analyzed: raññaḥ vā paccatthikānam jita kāle jāta ttā jeto raññaḥ hi attanaḥ jayam tattha āropetvā

original: jitavāti jetoti kumāro vutto. Maṅgalakāmatāya vā jetotissa nāmaṃ kataṃ, tasmā “jeyyo”ti
analyzed: jitavā ati jetoti kumāraḥ vuttaḥ maṅgala kāmatāya vā jetotissa nāmam katam tasmā jeyyaḥ ti

original: etasmiṃ atthe “jeto”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tassa jetassa rājakumārassa. Vanetiādito
analyzed: etasmin atthe jetoti vuttanti daṭṭhabbam tassa jetassa rāja kumārassa vana itiāditaḥ

original: paṭṭhāyeva taṃ tassa santakanti dassetuṃ “taṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbakāmasamiddhitāya
analyzed: paṭṭhāya iva tam tassa santakam ti dassetum tam hi itiādi vuttam sabba kāma samiddhitāya

original: vigatamalamaccheratāya karuṇādiguṇasamaṅgitāya ca niccakālaṃ upaṭṭhapito anāthānaṃ
analyzed: vigata malama cheratāya karuṇā ādi guṇa samaṅgi tāya ca nicca kālam upaṭṭhapitaḥ an āthānam

original: piṇḍo etassa atthīti anāthapiṇḍiko, tassa anāthapiṇḍikassa. Yadi jetavanaṃ, kathaṃ
analyzed: piṇḍaḥ etassa atthi iti anāthapiṇḍikaḥ tassa anāthapiṇḍikassa yadi jetavanam katham

original: anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmoti āha “anāthapiṇḍikenā”tiādi. Pañcavidhasenāsanaṅgasampattiyā
analyzed: anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmaḥ ti āha anāthapiṇḍikena atiādi pañcavidha senāsana aṅga sampattiyā

original: āramanti ettha pabbajitāti ārāmo, tasmiṃ ārāme. Yadipi so bhūmibhāgo koṭisantharena
analyzed: āramanti ettha pabbajitā ti ārāmaḥ tasmin ārāme yadi api saḥ bhūmi bhāgaḥ koṭi santharena

original: mahāseṭṭhinā kīto, rukkhā pana jetena na vikkītāti taṃ “jetavana”nti vattabbataṃ
analyzed: mahāseṭṭhinā kītaḥ rukkhā pana jetena na vikkītā ati tam jetavanam ti

original: labhatīti vadanti. Ubhinnampi vā tattha pariccāgavisesakittanatthaṃ ubhayavacanaṃ,
analyzed: labhati iti vadanti ubhinnam pi vā tattha ubhaya vacanam

original: jetenapi hi bhūmibhāgavikkayena laddhadhanaṃ tattha dvārakoṭṭhakakaraṇavasena viniyuttaṃ.
analyzed: jetena api hi bhūmi bhāga vikkayena laddha dhanam tattha dvāra koṭṭhaka karaṇa vasena viniyuttam

original: Sāvatthijetavanānaṃ bhūmibhāgavasena bhinnattā vuttaṃ “na hi sakkā ubhayattha ekaṃ
analyzed: sāvatthi jetavanānam bhūmi bhāga vasena bhinna ttā vuttam na hi sakkā ubhayattha ekam

original: samayaṃ viharitu”nti.
analyzed: samayam viharitum ti

original: Apākaṭāti sakko suyāmotiādinā anabhiññātā. Abhiññātānampi aññatarasaddo dissateva
analyzed: apākaṭā ati sakko suyāmā iti ādinā anabhiññātā abhiññātānam pi aññatara saddo dissatā iva

original: ekasadisāyattattāti dassetuṃ “abhijānāti no”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ahunā idāneva. Sādhāraṇavacanaṃ
analyzed: eka sadisa āyatta ttā ti dassetum abhijānāti no tiādi vuttam ahunā idānā iva sādhāraṇa vacanam

original: dibbataṃ antonītaṃ katvā. Devo eva devatā purisepi vattanato. Tenevāha “imasmiṃ panatthe”tiādi.
analyzed: dibbatam antonītam katvā devaḥ eva devatā purise pi vattanato tena iva āha imasmin pana attha itiādi

original: Nanu ca rūpāvacarasattānaṃ purisindriyaṃ natthi, yena te purisāti vucceyyuṃ? Yadipi
analyzed: nanu ca rūpāvacara sattānam purisa indriyam na atthi yena te purisā ti vucceyyum yadi pi

original: purisindriyaṃ natthi, purisasaṇṭhānassa pana purisavesassa ca vasena purisapuggalātveva
analyzed: purisa indriyam na atthi purisa saṇṭhānassa pana purisa vesassa ca vasena

original: vuccanti purisapakatibhāvato.
analyzed: vuccanti purisa pakati bhāvato

original: Abhikkantāti atikkantā, vigatāti atthoti āha “khaye dissatī”ti. Teneva hi “nikkhanto
analyzed: abhikkantā ati atikkantā vigatā ati attho ti āha khaye dissati iti tena iva hi nikkhantaḥ

original: paṭhamo yāmo”ti upari vuttaṃ. Abhikkantataroti ativiya kantataro. Tādiso ca sundaro
analyzed: paṭhamaḥ yāmaḥ ti upari vuttam abhikkantataro ti ativiya kantataro tādiso ca sundaro

analyzed: bhaddakaḥ nāma hoti iti āha sundare dissati iti ko ti deva nāga yakkha gandhabba ādīsu ko

analyzed: katamaḥ mā iti mama pādāni iti pāde iddhiyā ati imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā yasasā ati

analyzed: disā ti sabbā api disā pabhāsento candaḥ viya sūriyaḥ viya ca ekobhāsam ekālokam karonto ti

analyzed: gāthāya atthaḥ abhirūpā iti uḷāra rūpe sampanna rūpe

original: Kañcanasannibhattacatā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti adhippāyenāha “chaviya”nti.
analyzed: kañcana sannibha ttaca tā suvaṇṇa vaṇṇa ggahaṇena gahitā iti adhippāyena āha chaviyan ti

original: Chavigatā pana vaṇṇadhātu eva “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo”ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare.
analyzed: chavi gatā pana vaṇṇa dhātu eva suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ ti ettha vaṇṇa ggahaṇena gahitā ati apare

original: Vaṇṇanaṃ kittiyā ugghosananti vaṇṇo, thuti. Vaṇṇīyati asaṅkarato vavatthapīyatīti
analyzed: vaṇṇanam kittiyāḥ ugghosananti vaṇṇo thuti vaṇṇīyati asaṅkarataḥ vavatthapīyati iti

analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ kula vaggaḥ vaṇṇīyati phalam etena yathā sabhāvataḥ vibhāvīyati iti vaṇṇaḥ kāraṇam

original: Vaṇṇanaṃ dīgharassādivasena saṇṭhahananti vaṇṇo, saṇṭhānaṃ. Vaṇṇīyati aṇumahantādivasena
analyzed: vaṇṇanam dīgha rassa ādi vasena saṇṭhahananti vaṇṇo saṇṭhānam vaṇṇīyati aṇu mahanta ādi vasena

analyzed: pamīyati iti vaṇṇaḥ pamāṇam vaṇṇeti vikāram āpajjamānam hadayaṅgata bhāvam pakāseti iti

analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ rūpa āyatanam evam tena tena pavatti nimittena vaṇṇa saddassa tasmin tasmin atthe

analyzed: iddha anubhāvam nimminitvā kāmāvacarāḥ āgantum sakkonti oḷārika rūpa ttā

original: Tathā hi te kabaḷīkārabhakkhā. Rūpāvacarā na sakkonti tato sukhumatararūpattā. Tenāha
analyzed: tathā hi te kabaḷīkāra bhakkhāḥ rūpāvacarāḥ na sakkonti tatas sukhumatara rūpa ttā tena āha

original: “tesaṃ hī”tiādi. Tattha “atisukhumo”ti mūlapaṭisandhirūpaṃ sandhāya vadati. Na tena
analyzed: tesam hi itiādi tattha ati sukhumaḥ ti mūla paṭisandhi rūpam sandhāya vadati na tena

analyzed: iriyāpatha kappanam hoti iti etena brahma loke pi brahmānaḥ yebhuyyena nimmita rūpena iva

original: pavattantīti dasseti. Itarañhi ativiya sukhumaṃ rūpaṃ kevalaṃ cittuppādassa nissayādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ

original: saṇṭhānavantaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: saṇṭhānavantam hutvā tiṭṭhati

original: Anavasesattaṃ sakalatā. Yebhuyyatā bahulabhāvo. Abyāmissatā vijātiyena asaṅkaro.
analyzed: anavasesa ttam sakala tā yebhuyya tā bahula bhāvaḥ a byāmissa tā vijātiyena asaṅkaraḥ

original: Sukhena hi avokiṇṇatā tattha adhippetā. Anatirekatā taṃparamatā visesābhāvo. Kevalakappanti
analyzed: sukhena hi avokiṇṇa tā tattha adhippetā anatireka tā taṃparama tā visesa abhāvaḥ

original: kevalaṃ daḷhaṃ katvāti attho. Saṅghabhedāyāti saṅghe vivādāya, vivāduppādāyāti attho.

original: Kevalaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatavivittattā, etassa taṃ atthīti kevalī, sacchikatanirodho
analyzed: kevalam vuccati nibbānam sabba saṅkhata vivitta ttā etassa tam atthi iti kevalī sacchikata nirodhaḥ

original: khīṇāsavo. Tenāha “visaṃyogo attho”ti.
analyzed: khīṇa āsavaḥ tena āha visaṃyogaḥ attho ti

original: Kappasaddo panāyaṃ saupasaggo anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappaniyapade labbhamānaṃ
analyzed: kappa saddo pana ayam sa upasaggaḥ an upasaggaḥ ca ati adhippāyena okappaniya pade labbhamānam

original: kappasaddamattaṃ dasseti, aññathā kappapadaṃ anidassanameva siyā. Samaṇakappehīti
analyzed: kappa sadda mattam dasseti aññathā kappa padam a nidassanam eva siyā samaṇa kappehi iti

original: vinayasiddhehi samaṇavohārehi. Niccakappanti niccakālaṃ. Paññattīti nāmaṃ. Nāmañhetaṃ
analyzed: vinaya siddhehi samaṇa vohārehi niccakappanti niccakālam paññattī iti nāmam

original: tassa āyasmato, yadidaṃ kappoti. Kappitakesamassūti kattarikāya cheditakesamassu.
analyzed: tassa āyasmataḥ yat idam kappoti kappita kesa massu ati kattarikāya chedita kesa massu

original: Dvaṅgulakappoti majjhanhikavelāya vītikkantāya dvaṅgulatāvikappo. Lesoti apadeso.
analyzed: dvaṅgula kappo ti majjhanhika velāya vītikkantāya dvaṅgula tā vikappaḥ lesaḥ ti apadesaḥ

original: Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi obhāsassa kenacipi kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā,
analyzed: anavasesam pharitum samatthassa api obhāsassa kenacipi kāraṇena eka desa pharaṇam pi siyā

original: ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-saddo gahitoti āha “anavasesaṃ
analyzed: ayam pana sabbaso va pharati iti dassetum samanta atthaḥ kappa saddaḥ gahitaḥ ti āha anavasesam

original: samantato”ti. Īsaṃ asamattaṃ, kevalaṃ vā kevalakappaṃ. Bhagavato ābhāya anobhāsitameva

analyzed: hi padesam devatāḥ attanaḥ pabhāya obhāsenti na hi bhagavataḥ pabhā kāyaci pabhāya

original: abhibhuyyati, sūriyādīnampi pabhaṃ sā abhibhuyya tiṭṭhatīti.
analyzed: sūriya ādīnam pi pabham sā abhibhuyya tiṭṭhati iti

original: Yena vā kāraṇenāti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Hetuattho hi kiriyāya kāraṇaṃ, na
analyzed: yena vā kāraṇena ati hetumhi idam karaṇa vacanam hetu atthaḥ hi kiriyāya kāraṇam na

analyzed: karaṇam viya tasmā nānā pakāra guṇa visesa adhigamana tthā idha upasaṅkamana kiriyā ti

original: “annena vasati, vijjāya vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthameva taṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ
analyzed: annena vasati vijjāya vasati itiādīsu hetu attham eva tam karaṇa vacanam yuttam

original: na karaṇatthaṃ tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ “yena vā kāraṇenā”tiādi. Bhagavato satatappavattaniratisaya-sāduvipulamatarasa-saddhammaphalatāya
analyzed: na karaṇa attham tassa ayujjamāna ttā ti vuttam yena vā kāraṇena atiādi bhagavato satata ppavatta nirati saya sādu vipula mata rasa saddhamma phala tāya

original: sāduphalaniccaphalitamahārukkhena bhagavā upamito. Sāduphalūpabhogādhippāyaggahaṇeneva
analyzed: sādu phala nicca phalita mahā rukkhena bhagavā upamitaḥ sādu phala upabhoga adhippāya ggahaṇena iva

analyzed: ha isa sutta nikkhepaḥ tayidam pāḷiyam āgatam eva

original: Payojanampi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato duvidhaṃ. Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ anukkamena yāva anupādāparinibbānaṃ
analyzed: payojanam pi sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇataḥ duvidham tattha sādhāraṇam anukkamena yāva anupādā parinibbānam

original: vimuttirasattā bhagavato desanāya. Tenevāha “etadatthā kathā, etadatthā mantanā”tiādi.
analyzed: vimuttiḥ asattā bhagavataḥ desanāya tena iva āha etad atthā kathā etad atthā mantanā atiādi

original: Asādhāraṇaṃ pana tassā devatāya dassanamaggasamadhigamo, ubhayampetaṃ bāhirameva.
analyzed: asādhāraṇam pana tassā devatāya dassana magga samadhigamaḥ ubhayampetam bāhiram eva

original: Sace pana veneyyasantānagatampi desanābalasiddhisaṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanabhāvato
analyzed: sace pana veneyya santāna gatam pi desanā bala siddhi saṅkhātam payojanam adhippāya samijjhana bhāvato

original: yathādhippetatthasiddhiyā mahākāruṇikassa bhagavatopi payojanamevāti gaṇheyya, iminā
analyzed: mahā kāruṇikassa bhagavataḥ api payojanam eva ati gaṇheyya iminā

original: pariyāyenassa abbhantaratāpi siyā.
analyzed: pariyāyena assa abbhantara tā api siyā

original: Apica tassā devatāya oghataraṇākārassa yāthāvato anavabodho imissā desanāya samuṭṭhānaṃ,

original: tadavabodho payojanaṃ. So hi imāya desanāya bhagavantaṃ payojeti tannipphādanaparāyaṃ
analyzed: tad avabodhaḥ payojanam saḥ hi imāya desanāya bhagavantam payojā iti tat nipphādana parāyam

original: desanāti katvā. Yañhi desanāya sādhetabbaṃ phalaṃ, taṃ ākaṅkhitabbattā desakaṃ desanāya
analyzed: desanā ati katvā yat hi desanāya sādhetabbam phalam tam ākaṅkhitabba ttā desakam desanāya

original: payojetīti payojananti vuccati. Tathā devatāya tadaññesañca vineyyānaṃ patiṭṭhānāyūhanavissajjanañcettha

original: payojanaṃ. Tathā saṃsāracakkanivatti-saddhammacakkappavattisassatādimicchācāra-nirākaraṇaṃ
analyzed: payojanam tathā saṃsāra cakka nivatti saddhamma cakka ppavatti sassata ādi micchā ācāra nirākaraṇam

original: sammāvādapurekkhāro akusalamūlasamūhananaṃ kusalamūlasamāropanaṃ apāyadvārapidahanaṃ
analyzed: sammāvāda purekkhāraḥ akusala mūla samūhananam kusala mūla samāropanam apāya dvāra pidahanam

original: saggamokkhadvāravivaraṇaṃ pariyuṭṭhānavūpasamanaṃ anusayasamugghātanaṃ “mutto mocessāmī”ti
analyzed: saggamokkha dvāra vivaraṇam pariyuṭṭhāna vūpasamanam anusaya samugghātanam muttaḥ mocessāmi iti

original: purimapaṭiññāavisaṃvādanaṃ tappaṭipakkhamāramanorathavisaṃvādanaṃ titthiyasamayanimmathanaṃ
analyzed: purima paṭiññā avisaṃvādanam tad paṭipakkha māra manoratha visaṃvādanam titthiya samaya nimmathanam

original: buddhadhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīnipi payojanāni idha veditabbāni.
analyzed: buddha dhamma patiṭṭhāpanan ti evamādīni pi payojanāni idha veditabbāni

original: Yathā devatā oghataraṇe saṃsayapakkhandā, tādisā aññe ca saṅkhātadhammānaṃ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Piṇḍatthā pana “appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha”nti padadvaye catusaccakammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena
analyzed: piṇḍatthā pana appatiṭṭham pada dvaye catu acca kammaṭṭhāna anuyoga vasena

original: yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro kusalamūlasamāyogo olīyanātidhāvanāvissajjanaṃ upāyavinibandhavidhamanaṃ

original: cetokhilavivecanaṃ abhinandananivāraṇaṃ saṃsaggātikkamo vivādamūlapariccāgo akusalakammapathaviddhaṃsanaṃ

original: sikkhattayānuyogo samathavipassanānuṭṭhānaṃ bhāvanāsacchikiriyāsiddhi sīlakkhandhādipārisuddhīti
analyzed: sikkha tayā anuyogaḥ samatha vipassanā anuṭṭhānam bhāvanā sacchikiriyā siddhi sīlakkhandha ādi pārisuddhi iti

original: evamādayo veditabbā.
analyzed: evamādayaḥ veditabbā

original: Tattha yesaṃ kilesādīnaṃ vasena patiṭṭhāti saṃsīdati, yesañca abhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ vasena

original: āyūhati nibbuyhati, ubhayametaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, tappabhāvitā tadubhayanissitā ca
analyzed: āyūhati nibbuyhati ubhayam etam samudaya saccam tad pabhāvitā tad ubhaya nissitā ca

original: paṭicchannaṃ katvā desanā upāyo mānaniggaṇhanavasena tassā devatāya saccābhisamayakāraṇabhāvato

original: patiṭṭhānāyūhanapaṭikkhepopadesena caturoghanirattharaṇatthikehi antadvayarahitā
analyzed: patiṭṭhāna āyūhana paṭikkhepa upadesena catur ogha nirattharaṇatthikehi anta dvaya rahitā

original: majjhimā paṭipatti paṭipajjitabbāti ayamettha bhagavato āṇattīti ayaṃ desanāhāro.
analyzed: majjhimā paṭipatti paṭipajjitabbā ti ayam ettha bhagavataḥ āṇatti iti ayam desanā āhāraḥ

original: Parasaṃsayapakkhandanatāya ñātukāmatāya ca kathaṃ nūti pucchāvasena vuttaṃ? Abhimukhabhāvato
analyzed: para saṃsaya pakkhandana tāya ñātu kāma tāya ca katham nu ti pucchā vasena vuttam abhimukha bhāvato

original: ekapuggalabhāvato ca “tva”nti vuttaṃ. Paramukkaṃsagatassa garubhāvassa anaññayogyassa
analyzed: eka puggala bhāvataḥ ca tvan ti vuttam param ukkaṃsa gatassa garu bhāvassa anañña yogyassa

original: saddhammadhurassa paridīpanato sādhūti marisasīlādiguṇatāya “mārisā”ti vuttaṃ. Avahananato
analyzed: saddhamma dhurassa paridīpanato sādhu iti marisa sīla ādi guṇa tāya mārisa ati vuttam avahananato

original: rāsibhāvato ca “ogha”nti vuttaṃ. Ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa katattā pariyosāpitattā
analyzed: rāsi bhāvataḥ ca oghanti vuttam ñātum icchitassa atthassa kata ttā pariyosāpita ttā

original: “itī”ti vuttaṃ. Saṃsīdanalakkhaṇassa patiṭṭhānassa akātabbato sabbaso ca akatattā.
analyzed: iti iti vuttam saṃsīdana lakkhaṇassa patiṭṭhānassa a kātabbataḥ sabbaso ca a kata ttā

original: “Appatiṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ akaraṇaṃ ekaṃsikanti khoti avadhāraṇavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: appatiṭṭhanti vuttam tayidam akaraṇam ekaṃsikam ti kho ti avadhāraṇa vasena vuttam

original: Tassa ca appatiṭṭhānassa sasantatigatattā “tva”nti ca pucchitattā “aha”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tassa ca appatiṭṭhānassa sa santati gata ttā tvanti ca pucchita ttā aham ti vuttam

original: Devatāya sambodhanato piyālapanato ca, “āvuso”ti vuttaṃ. Nibbuyhanalakkhaṇassa āyūhanassa
analyzed: devatāya sambodhanato piya ālapanato ca āvuso ti vuttam nibbuyhana lakkhaṇassa āyūhanassa

original: akātabbato sabbaso ca akatattā anāyūhanti vuttaṃ. Tiṇṇākārassa oghānaṃ anicchitabhāvato
analyzed: a kātabbataḥ sabbasas ca a kata ttā an āyūhanti vuttam tiṇṇa ākārassa oghānam an icchita bhāvato

original: eva tattha saṃsayassa anapagatattā oghataraṇassa ca avisesattā “yathā kathaṃ panā”ti
analyzed: eva tattha saṃsayassa an apagata ttā ogha taraṇassa ca avisesa ttā yathā katham pana ati

original: vuttaṃ. Tathā saṃsīdanalakkhaṇaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ saṃsāre ca saṇṭhānanti anatthantarattā
analyzed: vuttam tathā saṃsīdana lakkhaṇam patiṭṭhānam saṃsāre ca saṇṭhānan ti anatthantara ttā

original: abhinnakālikaṃ. Tathā nibbuyhanalakkhaṇaṃ āyūhanaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā ativattananti
analyzed: abhinna kālikam tathā nibbuyhana lakkhaṇam āyūhanam sammāpaṭipattiyāḥ ativattananti

original: anatthantarattā abhinnakālikanti vuttaṃ “yadā svāhaṃ…pe… tadāssu nibbuyhāmī”ti. Tadubhayassa
analyzed: anatthantara ttā abhinna kālikam ti vuttam yadā tadā assu nibbuyhāmi iti tad ubhayassa

original: paṭipakkhabhāvato paṭibāhanato ca oghātiṇṇāti vuttaṃ “evaṃ khvāhaṃ…pe… oghamatari”nti.
analyzed: paṭipakkha bhāvato paṭibāhanato ca oghātiṇṇā ti vuttam evam khvā aham pe ogham atarin ti

original: Ekabuddhantarantarikattā sudūrakālikatāya “cirassa”nti vuttaṃ. Antarā adiṭṭhapubbatāya
analyzed: eka buddha antarantarika ttā su dūra kālika tāya cirassanti vuttam antarā a diṭṭha pubba tāya

original: vimhayanīyatāya ca “vatā”ti vuttaṃ. Tadā upalabbhamānatāya attapaccakkhatāya ca “passāmī”ti
analyzed: vimhayanīya tāya ca vatā iti vuttam tadā upalabbhamāna tāya atta paccakkha tāya ca passāmi iti

original: vuttaṃ. Bāhitapāpato brahmassa ca ariyamaggassa aṇanato paṭivijjhanato “brāhmaṇa”nti
analyzed: vuttam bāhitapāpataḥ brahmassa ca ariya maggassa aṇanataḥ paṭivijjhanataḥ brāhmaṇa nti

original: vuttaṃ. Kilesasantāpavūpasamanato dukkhasantāpavūpasamanato ca sabbaso nibbutattā
analyzed: vuttam kilesa santāpa vūpasamanataḥ dukkha santāpa vūpasamanataḥ ca sabbasas nibbuta ttā

original: “parinibbuta”nti vuttaṃ. Taraṇapayogassa nibbattitattā upari taritabbābhāvato ca

original: “tiṇṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Ñāṇacakkhunā oloketabbato lujjanato palujjanato ca “loke”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tiṇṇan ti vuttam ñāṇa cakkhunā oloketabbataḥ lujjanataḥ palujjanataḥ ca loketi vuttam

original: Visayesu sañjanato jātabhāvato “visattika”nti vuttaṃ. Ñāṇassa paccakkhabhāvato nigamanato
analyzed: visayesu sañjanataḥ jāta bhāvataḥ visattikanti vuttam ñāṇassa paccakkha bhāvataḥ nigamanato

original: ca “ida”nti vuttaṃ. Bhāsitattā parisamattattā ca “avocā”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ gahitattā
analyzed: ca idam ti vuttam bhāsita ttā parisamatta ttā ca avoca iti vuttam paṭhamam gahita ttā

original: paccāmasanato ca “sā devatā”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭikkhepassa abhāvato atthassa anumoditabbato
analyzed: paccāmasanato ca sā devatā iti vuttam paṭikkhepassa abhāvataḥ atthassa anumoditabbato

original: “samanuñño”ti vuttaṃ. Vineyyānaṃ sāsanato paramatthasampattito ca “satthā”ti vuttaṃ.

original: Sabbakilesa-taṇhādiṭṭhi-taṇhāyatana-sassatādivasena santiṭṭhato saṃsāre saṃsīdanaṃ

analyzed: vijjamāne sabba diṭṭha abhinivesa atidhāvana abhinivesa ādīnam vasena āyūhantassa saṃsāra mahoghena

original: nibbuyhanaṃ hotīti yujjati sammāpaṭipattiyā ativattanato. Brahmassa ariyamaggassa

analyzed: parinibbuta bhāvaḥ yujjati sabbaso sa vāsanā pahīna kilesa ttā tathā ca visattikāya tiṇṇa bhāvo

original: yujjati yathā yāya lesopi na dissati, evaṃ aggamaggena tassā samucchinnattāti ayaṃ yuttihāro.
analyzed: yujjati yathā yāya lesaḥ api na dissati evam aggamaggena ayam yutti hāro

original: Kilesavaṭṭavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ visesato kammavaṭṭassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Abhisaṅkhāravasena
analyzed: kilesa vaṭṭa vasena patiṭṭhānam visesataḥ kamma vaṭṭassa padaṭṭhānam abhisaṅkhāra vasena

analyzed: khandha avijjā phassa saññā vitakka yoni soma nasikāra pāpa mitta paratas ghosāḥ diṭṭhi vasena

analyzed: patiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānam yathā āha paṭisambhidā magge khandhāḥ api diṭṭhi ṭṭhānam

original: avijjāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhāna”ntiādi. Taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanaavasesakilesābhisaṅkhāravasena

analyzed: āyūhanassa padaṭṭhānam iminā nayena yathāraham taṇhā diṭṭha ādi vasena patiṭṭhāna āyūhanānam

analyzed: gahitāḥ ekantataḥ ogha nittharaṇa upāya bhāvato tad gahaṇena ca sabbe pi sattatiṃsa bodhi pakkhiya dhammā

original: daṭṭhabbā. “Kathaṃ nu kho imaṃ desanaṃ nissāya sammadeva paṭivijjhantā catubbidhampi
analyzed: daṭṭhabbā katham nu kho imam desanam nissāya sammat eva paṭivijjhantā catubbidham pi

original: oghaṃ tarantā sakalasaṃsāramahoghato nitthareyyuṃ, pare ca tattha patiṭṭhapeyyu”nti
analyzed: ogham tarantā sakala saṃsāra mahā oghataḥ nitthareyyum pare ca tattha patiṭṭhapeyyunti

original: ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo. Padanibbacanaṃ niruttaṃ, taṃ “eva”ntiādinidānapadānaṃ
analyzed: ayam ettha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ pada nibbacanam niruttam tam eva nti ādi nidāna padānam

original: sukarattā ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha.
analyzed: su karattāḥ ativitthāra bhayena na vitthārayimha

original: Pada-padattha-desanā-nikkhepa-suttasandhi-vasena pañcavidhā sandhi. Tattha padassa
analyzed: pada padattha desanā nikkhepa sutta sandhi vasena pañcavidhā sandhi tattha padassa

original: padantarena sambandho padasandhi. Tathā padatthassa padatthantarena sambandho padatthasandhi,
analyzed: pada antarena sambandhaḥ pada sandhi tathā padatthassa padattha antarena sambandhaḥ padattha sandhi

original: yo “kiriyākārakasambandho”ti vutto. Nānānusandhikassa taṃtaṃanusandhīti sambandho,
analyzed: yaḥ kiriyā kāraka sambandho ti vuttaḥ nānā anusandhikassa taṃ taṃ anusandhi iti sambandhaḥ

original: ekānusandhikassa pana pubbāparasambandho desanāsandhi, yā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pucchānusandhi
analyzed: eka anusandhikassa pana pubba apara sambandhaḥ desanā sandhi yā aṭṭhakathā ayam puccha anusandhi

original: ajjhāsayānusandhi yathānusandhī”ti tidhā vibhattā. Ajjhāsayo cettha attajjhāsayo
analyzed: yathā anusandhi iti tidhā vibhattā ajjhāsayaḥ ca ittha

original: parajjhāsayoti dvidhā veditabbo. Nikkhepasandhi catunnaṃ suttanikkhepānaṃ vasena
analyzed: dvidhā veditabbaḥ nikkhepa sandhi catunnam sutta nikkhepānam vasena

original: veditabbā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ papañcasūdanīṭīkāyaṃ vuttanayena gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: veditabbā yam pana ittha vattabbam tam papañcasūdanī ṭīkāyam vutta nayena gahetabbam

original: Suttasandhi idha paṭhamanikkhepavasena veditabbā.
analyzed: idha paṭhama nikkhepa vasena veditabbā

original: “Kasmā panettha oghataraṇasuttameva paṭhamaṃ nikkhitta”nti nāyamanuyogo katthaci

analyzed: na pavattati apica appatiṭṭham anāyūham ogham atarin ti patiṭṭhāna āyūhana paṭikkhepa vasena

analyzed: anta dvaya vivajjana mukhena vā majjhimāya paṭipadāya vibhāvanato sabba paṭhamam idam

original: “Appatiṭṭhaṃ…pe… anāyūhaṃ oghamatari”nti ayaṃ desanā –

original: “Sabbadā sīlasampanno, paññavā susamāhito;
analyzed: sabbadā sīla sampannaḥ paññavā su samāhitaḥ

analyzed: nandī rāga parikkhīṇo so gambhīre na sīdati

analyzed: pañca chinde pañca jahe pañca cuttari bhāvaye

analyzed: pañca saṅga atigaḥ bhikkhu ogha tiṇṇaḥ ti vuccati

original: “Tasmā jantu sadā sato, kāmāni parivajjaye;

analyzed: te pahāya tare ogham nāvam sitvā ava pāragū

analyzed: ekāyanam jāti khayanta dassī maggam pajānāti hita anukampī

original: Etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti. –
analyzed: etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe tarissanti ye ca taranti

original: Evamādīhi desanāhi saṃsandatīti ayaṃ catubyūho hāro.
analyzed: evamādīhi saṃsandati iti ayam catu byūhaḥ hāraḥ

original: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha saṃkilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ āyūhanañca. Tena ayonisomanasikāro
analyzed: appatiṭṭham an āyūhanti ettha saṃkilesa vasena patiṭṭhānam āyūhanam ca tena a yoniso manasikāro

original: dīpito, santakilesavasena anāyūhanena yonisomanasikāro. Tattha ayonisomanasikaroto
analyzed: dīpito santa kilesa vasena anāyūhanena yonisoma nasikāro tattha

original: taṇhāvijjā pavaḍḍhati. Tesu taṇhāgahaṇena ca taṇhāmūlakā dhammā āvattanti. Avijjāgahaṇena
analyzed: taṇhā vijjā pavaḍḍhati tesu taṇhā gahaṇena ca taṇhā mūlakāḥ dhammāḥ āvattanti avijjā gahaṇena

original: avijjāmūlakaṃ sabbaṃ bhavacakkaṃ āvattati. Yonisomanasikāraggahaṇena ca yonisomanasikāramūlakā
analyzed: avijjā mūlakam sabbam bhava cakkam āvattati yoni soma nasikāra ggahaṇena ca yoni soma nasikāra mūlakā

analyzed: dhammā āvattanti catubbidham ca sampatti cakkam patiṭṭhāna āyūhana paṭikkhepena pana

original: sammāpaṭipatti dīpitā, sā ca saṅkhepato sīlādisaṅgahā. Tattha sīlaggahaṇena ekādasa
analyzed: sammā paṭipatti dīpitā sā ca saṅkhepato sīla ādi saṅgahā tattha sīla ggahaṇena ekādasa

analyzed: sīla anisaṃsāḥ āvattanti samādhi ggahaṇena pañcaṅgikaḥ sammāsamādhi pañcaññāṇikaḥ sammāsamādhi

original: samādhiparikkhārā ca āvattanti. Paññāgahaṇena paññā ca sammādiṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhisudassanā
analyzed: samādhi parikkhārā ca āvattanti paññā gahaṇena paññā ca sammādiṭṭhī iti sammādiṭṭhi su dassanā

original: sabbepi ariyamaggadhammā āvattantīti ayaṃ āvatto hāro.
analyzed: sabbe pi ariya magga dhammā āvattanti iti ayam āvattaḥ hāro

original: Patiṭṭhānaṃ kilesādivasena sattavidhaṃ. Āyūhanaṃ abhisaṅkhārādivasena sattavidhaṃ.

original: Tathā tappaṭipakkhato appatiṭṭhānaṃ anāyūhanañca. Ayamettha dhammavibhatti. Padaṭṭhānabhūmivibhattiyo
analyzed: tathā tad paṭipakkhataḥ appatiṭṭhānam anāyūhanam ca ayam ettha dhamma vibhatti padaṭṭhāna bhūmi vibhattiyaḥ

original: pana heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbā. Ayaṃ vibhattihāro.
analyzed: pana heṭṭhā vutta naya anusārena veditabbā ayam vibhatti hāro

original: Pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ sammadeva sampādetvā samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā bhāvanaṃ
analyzed: pubbabhāga paṭipadam sammad eva sampādetvā samatha vipassanam yuga naddham katvā bhāvanam

original: anāyūhaṃ oghaṃ tarati. Kilesādīnaṃ vasena pana saṃsīdanto nibbuyhanto saṃsāre patiṭṭhānato

analyzed: āyatim punabbhava abhinibbattiyāḥ āyūhanataḥ ogham na tarati iti ayam parivattaḥ hāraḥ

original: Appatiṭṭhaṃ asantiṭṭhanto asaṃsīdanto anibbisaṃ anavinibbisanti pariyāyavacanaṃ,
analyzed: appatiṭṭham a santiṭṭhantaḥ a saṃsīdantaḥ anibbisam an avinibbisanti pariyāya vacanam

original: pariyāyavacanaṃ, atari atikkami accavāyīti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi
analyzed: pariyāya vacanam atari atikkami accavāyi iti pariyāya vacanam iminā nayena sesa padesu pi

analyzed: pariyāya vacanam veditabbanti ayam vevacanaḥ hāro

original: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha patiṭṭhaṃ āyūhanti kilesānaṃ kiccakaraṇapaññatti. Pariyuṭṭhānānaṃ

analyzed: vibhāvana paññatti abhisaṅkhārānam viruhana paññatti taṇhāya assāda paññatti diṭṭhiyā

original: parinipphandanapaññatti. Bhavadiṭṭhiyā bhavābhinivesapaññatti. Vibhavadiṭṭhiyā vipallāsapaññatti.
analyzed: parinipphandana paññatti bhava diṭṭhiyā bhava abhinivesa paññatti vibhava diṭṭhiyā vipallāsa paññatti

original: Kāmasukhānuyogassa kāmesu anugijjhanapaññatti. Attakilamathānuyogassa attaparitāpanapaññatti.

analyzed: pariññā paññatti pahātabba dhammānam pahāna paññatti maggassa bhāvanā paññatti

original: Nirodhassa sacchikiriyāpaññattīti ayaṃ paññattihāro.
analyzed: nirodhassa sacchikiriyā paññatti iti ayam paññatti hāro

original: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha patiṭṭhānāyūhanaggahaṇena oghaggahaṇena ca samudayasaccaṃ

analyzed: tattha ye lokiyā pañca kkhandhāḥ yesam vasena ye

original: lokuttarā cattāro khandhā, yesaṃ vasena oghataraṇasiddhi. Ayaṃ khandhamukhena otaraṇā.

analyzed: dve āyatana mukhena dhātu mukhena ca tathā

original: ettha patiṭṭhānāyūhanaggahaṇena kilesābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Kilesābhisaṅkhārādayo

original: oghataraṇavacanena ca saha vipassanāya maggo kathito. Evañca saṅkhārakkhandho dhammāyatanaṃ

original: dhammadhātu ca gahitāti evampi khandhamukhena āyatanamukhena dhātumukhena otaraṇā.
analyzed: dhammadhātu ca gahitā ati evam pi khandha mukhena āyatana mukhena dhātu mukhena otaraṇā

original: Vipassanā ce aniccānupassanā, animittamukhena vimokkhamukhaṃ, dukkhānupassanā ce,
analyzed: vipassanā ce anicca anupassanā animitta mukhena vimokkha mukham dukkha anupassanā ce

original: appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṃ, anattānupassanā ce, suññatavimokkhamukhanti evaṃ vimokkhamukhena
analyzed: appaṇihita vimokkha mukham anatta anupassanā ce suññata vimokkha mukham ti evam vimokkha mukhena

analyzed: otaraṇam magge sekkhā sīla kkhandha ādayaḥ dhamma āyatana dhammadhātū anāsavā ca evam pi

original: kho khandhādimukhena otaraṇāti ayaṃ otaraṇo hāro.
analyzed: kho khandha ādi mukhena ayam otaraṇaḥ hāro

original: Appatiṭṭhanti ārambho. Anāyūhanti padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi, tathā oghanti. Atarinti pana padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi cāti ayaṃ sodhano hāro.
analyzed: ārambhaḥ pada suddhi no ārambha suddhi tathā pana pada suddhi ca iva ārambha suddhi ca ati ayam sodhanaḥ hāro

original: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiādivasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ

original: sādhāraṇato paṭikkhepacodanāti katvā oghamatarinti taṃ vikappetvā visesavacanaṃ.
analyzed: sādhāraṇataḥ paṭikkhepa codanā ti katvā ogham atarin ti tam vikappetvā visesa vacanam

original: Oghataraṇañhi cattāro ariyamaggā. Tattha paṭhamadutiyamaggā avisesena diṭṭhoghataraṇaṃ,

original: tatiyamaggo kāmoghataraṇaṃ, aggamaggo sesoghataraṇanti ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
analyzed: tatiya maggo kāma ogha taraṇam agga maggo sesa ogha taraṇam ti ayam adhiṭṭhānaḥ hāro

original: Kilesavasena patiṭṭhānassa ayonisomanasikāro hetu. Abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanassa
analyzed: kilesa vasena patiṭṭhānassa ayoniso manasikāraḥ hetu abhisaṅkhāra vasena āyūhanassa

original: kilesā hetū. Appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanānaṃ pana yathākkamaṃ yonisomanasikārapahānāni hetū.
analyzed: kilesāḥ hetū pana yathākkamam yoni soma nasikāra pahānāni hetū

original: Saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassanā taṇhāvasena yathārahaṃ tassa hetū. Tenāha
analyzed: saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assāda anupassanā taṇhā vasena yathāraham tassa hetū tena āha

original: bhagavā – “saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti.
analyzed: bhagavā saṃyojaniyesu bhikkhave dhammesu assāda anupassinaḥ taṇhā pavaḍḍhati iti

original: Khandhāvijjāphassasaññāvitakkāyonisomanasikārapāpamittaparatoghosā diṭṭhivasena patiṭṭhānassa
analyzed: khandha avijjā phassa saññā vitakka yoni so manasikāra pāpa mitta paratas ghosāḥ diṭṭhi vasena patiṭṭhānassa

original: hetū. Tenāha – paṭisambhidāmagge “khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, avijjāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhāna”ntiādi.
analyzed: hetū tena āha paṭisambhidā magge khandhā api diṭṭhi ṭhānam avijjā api diṭṭhi ṭṭhāna ntiādi

original: Taṇhābhinandanā avasesakilesābhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanassa hetū. Iminā nayena yathārahaṃ
analyzed: taṇhā abhinandanā avasesa kilesa abhisaṅkhāra vasena āyūhanassa hetū iminā nayena yathāraham

original: taṇhādiṭṭhivasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ hetuvibhāgo niddhāretabbo, tabbipariyāyena
analyzed: taṇhā diṭṭhi vasena patiṭṭhānā yūhanānam hetu vibhāgaḥ niddhāretabbaḥ tad vipariyāyena

original: appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanānaṃ. Kilesuppādane hi sammadeva ādīnavadassanaṃ appatiṭṭhānassa
analyzed: kilesa uppādane hi sammad eva ādīnava dassanam appatiṭṭhānassa

original: hetū, abhisaṅkharaṇe ādīnavadassanaṃ anāyūhanassa hetū, vipassanāya ussukkāpanaṃ
analyzed: hetū abhisaṅkharaṇe ādīnava dassanam anāyūhanassa hetū vipassanāya ussukkāpanam

original: oghataraṇassa hetūti ayaṃ parikkhāro hāro.
analyzed: ogha taraṇassa hetu uti ayam parikkhāraḥ hāro

original: Yathāvuttavibhāgehi patiṭṭhānāyūhanehi catubbidhassapi oghassa parisuddhi. Appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanehi

original: Puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otari aññattha okāsaṃ alabhamāno. Evaṃ sesāpi. Maṇivammanti
analyzed: puratthima cakkavāḷa mukha vaṭṭiyam otari aññattha okāsam a labhamāno evam sesā api

original: indanīlamaṇimayaṃ kavacaṃ. Buddhānaṃ abhimukhabhāgo buddhavīthi, sā yāva cakkavāḷā

original: tehi devabrahmehi valañjitabuddhavīthiyāva.
analyzed: tehi devabrahmehi valañjita buddha vīthiyā ava

original: Samiti saṅgati sannipāto samayo, mahanto samayo mahāsamayoti āha “mahāsamūho”ti.

original: Pavaddhaṃ vanaṃ pavananti āha “vanasaṇḍo”ti. Devaghaṭāti devasamūhā. Samādahaṃsūti
analyzed: āha

original: samāhitaṃ lokuttarasamādhiṃ suṭṭhu appitaṃ akaṃsu. Tathā samāhitaṃ pana samādhinā

original: attano…pe… akariṃsu. Vinayati asse etehīti nettāni, yottāni. Avīthipaṭipannānaṃ assānaṃ

original: acodanaṃ avāraṇamevāti āha “acodento avārento”ti.
analyzed: a codanam a vāraṇam eva ati āha a codentaḥ a vārentaḥ iti

original: Yathā khīlaṃ bhittiyaṃ, bhūmiyaṃ vā ākoṭitaṃ dunnīharaṇaṃ, yathā ca palighaṃ nagarappavesanivāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: yathā khīlam bhittiyam bhūmiyam vā ākoṭitam dunnīharaṇam yathā ca paligham nagara ppavesa nivāraṇam

original: yathā ca indakhīlaṃ gambhīranemi sunikhātaṃ dunnīharaṇaṃ, evaṃ rāgādayo sattasantānato

original: dunnīharaṇā nibbānanagarappavesanivāraṇā cāti te “khīlaṃ palighaṃ indakhīla”nti ca

original: appaṭihatacārikaṃ caranti. Buddhacakkhu-dhammacakkhu-dibbacakkhu-samantacakkhu-pakaticakkhūnaṃ

analyzed: vasena na gacchanti na vattanti na āgacchanti an uppādanataḥ aparādham

original: Sabbasaṃyogāti vibhattilopena niddeso, sabbe saṃyogeti attho. Visajjāti visajjitvā. Evampīti imāyapi gāthāya vasena “āguṃ na karotī”ti pade.

original: Gatāseti gatā eva. Na gamissanti pariniṭṭhitasaraṇagamanattā. Lokuttarasaraṇagamanañhettha
analyzed: gatā ase iti gatāḥ eva na gamissanti pariniṭṭhita saraṇa gamana ttā lokuttara saraṇa gamanam ha ittha

analyzed: adhippetam tena āha nibbematika saraṇa gamanena gatā ati te hi niyamena apāyam na gamissanti

original: devakāyañca paripūressanti. Ye pana lokiyena saraṇagamanena buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā,
analyzed: deva kāyam ca paripūressanti ye pana lokiyena saraṇa gamanena buddham saraṇam gatāḥ

original: Samayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: 8. Sakalikasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sakalika sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 38. Tanti uyyānaṃ saṅkhaṃ gatanti sambandho. Dhanunā sarena gahanti pothayanti bādhentīti

original: puññānubhāvena upahatattā sayampi paripatantī vātaṃ upatthambheti. Abhihani satthārā

original: aphāsu jātanti etenapi upādiṇṇakasarīre nāma aniṭṭhāpi samphassakā patanti eva tathārūpena

original: Visamoti bhūmibhāgavasena visamo. Sivikākārena sajjito mañco eva mañcasivikā.

original: Bhusāti daḷhā. Dukkhāti dukkhamā duttitikkhā. Kharāti kakkasā. Kaṭukāti aniṭṭhā.
analyzed: bhusā ati daḷhā dukkhā ati dukkhamā duttitikkhā kharā ati kakkasā kaṭukā ati aniṭṭhā

original: Asātāti na sātā appiyā. Na appetīti na upeti. Na appāyantīti na khamanti. Vedanādhivāsanakhantiyā
analyzed: na sātā appiyā na appeti iti na upeti na appāyanti iti na khamanti vedanā adhivāsana khantiyā

original: satisampajaññayuttattā sabbasattaṭṭhitāhārasamudayavatthujātassa ādīnavanissaraṇānaṃ

original: pageva suppaṭividitattā yathā samudācāro cittaṃ nābhibhavati, evaṃ sammadeva upaṭṭhāpitasatisampajaññattā

original: Sīhaseyyanti ettha sayanaṃ seyyā, sīhassa viya seyyā sīhaseyyā, taṃ sīhaseyyaṃ. Atha
analyzed: sīhaseyyanti ettha sayanam seyyā sīhassa viya seyyā sīhaseyyā tam sīhaseyyam atha

original: bhikkhu viya satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva sayati. Tenāha “dve purimapāde”tiādi. Purimapādeti

original: veditabbaṃ. Ṭhitokāsasallakkhaṇaṃ abhīrukabhāveneva. Sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvātiādinā

original: Kiṃ panettha taṃ catutthajjhānanti? Ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ. Tato hi vuṭṭhahitvā vipassanaṃ

original: vihāsi. Aggaphalavasena pavattaṃ panettha catutthajjhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha yathā

analyzed: jāti samanvayāḥ yebhuyya vuttikāḥ evam bhagavataḥ ariya jāti samanvayam yebhuyya vuttikam

analyzed: āha uttamaseyyā iti

analyzed: na vuttanti tattha kāraṇam āha gilāna seyyā ha isā ati sā hi cira kāla ppavattikā hoti

original: Visuṃ visuṃ rāsivasena anāgantvā ekajjhaṃ puñjavasena āgatattā vuttaṃ “sabbāpi tā”ti.

original: Susammaṭṭhakañcanaṃ viyāti sammaṭṭhasusajjitasuvaṇṇaṃ viya.
analyzed: su sammaṭṭha kañcanam viyāti sammaṭṭha su sajjita suvaṇṇam viya

original: Dhammālapananti asaṅkhārikasamuppannasabhāvālapanaṃ. Samullapitañhi ākārasamānavacanametaṃ.
analyzed: dhamma ālapanam ti asaṅkhārika samuppanna sabhāva ālapanam samullapitam hi ākāra samāna vacanam etam

original: Nāgo viya vāti pavattatīti nāgavo. Tassa bhāvo nāgavatā. Vibhattilopena hesa niddeso,

original: mahānāgahatthisadisatāyāti attho. Byattuparicaraṇaṭṭhenāti byattaṃ uparūpari attano
analyzed: mahā nāga hatthi sadisa tāya ati atthaḥ byattu paricaraṇa ṭṭhena ati byattam upari upari

original: kiriyācaraṇena. Ājānīyoti sammāpatitaṃ dukkhaṃ sahanto attanā kātabbakiriyaṃ dhīro

original: appaṭisamaṭṭheneva. “Mutto moceyya”ntiādi dhuravāhaṭṭhena. Nibbisevanaṭṭhenāti rāgādivisavigatabhāvena.

original: Aniyamitāṇattīti anuddesikaṃ āṇāpanaṃ. Sāmaññakatopi samādhisaddo pakaraṇato idha

analyzed: vipassanā viya ca sa saṅkhārena sa payogena tad aṅga ppahāna vikkhambhana pahāna vasena

analyzed: dhātuyaḥ kāma avacarā dve evam dhātu nānākaraṇam paṭicca ñāṇam pavattati

original: taṃ upādiṇṇadhātuvasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ paccekabuddhānañhi dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānañca

analyzed: ekam eva nibbānam tattha upacāra vasena puthuttam gahetabban ti āha puthu jana sādhāraṇe

original: Evaṃ visayavasena paññāya mahattaṃ puthuttañca dassetvā idāni sampayuttadhammavasena

analyzed: paripūreti pīti somanassa sahagatā hi paññā abhirati vasena tad ārammaṇe phullitā vikasitā

original: Therotiādinā abhinīhārasiddhā therassa hāsapaññatāti dasseti.

original: Esa nayo sesesupi. Samullapanaṃ ālāpasallapanaṃ. Saṃsaggavatthunā iminā tassa paribhogo paribhogasaṃsaggo.

original: Dhovanādiparikammenāti catūsu pāsāṇesu dhovanadosanīharaṇatāpanasaṇhakaraṇādiparikammena.

analyzed: appamāde samodhānam gacchanti tassa nippadesa ttā aggam seṭṭham mahantam sesa dhammānam

original: appamādo. Paṭilābhakaṭṭhenāti adhigamahetutāya. Lokiyopi samānoti kāmāvacaropi samāno.
analyzed: appamādaḥ paṭilābhaka ṭṭhena ati adhigama hetutāya lokiyaḥ api samānaḥ ti kāmāvacaraḥ api samānaḥ

original: Mahaggatānuttarānaṃ pubbabhāge pavattaappamādo hi idhādhippeto.
analyzed: mahaggata anuttarānam pubbabhāge pavatta appamādaḥ hi idha adhippetaḥ

original: Pasaṃsanti paṇḍitāti yojanā. Appamādassa pāsaṃsabhāve ekantato kattabbatāya pana
analyzed: pasaṃsanti paṇḍitā ti yojanā appamādassa pāsaṃsa bhāve ekantato kattabba tāya pana

original: “etānī”tiādinā kāraṇaṃ āha. Imissā yojanāya “puññakiriyāsū”ti padassa “appamatto”ti
analyzed: etāni iti ādinā kāraṇam āha imissā yojanāya puñña kiriyāsu iti padassa appamatto ti

original: iminā sambandho. Yasmā paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti, yasmā ca puññakiriyāsu appamatto
analyzed: iminā sambandhaḥ yasmai paṇḍitāḥ appamādam pasaṃsanti yasmai ca puñña kiriyāsu appamattaḥ

original: ubho atthe adhiggaṇhāti, tasmā āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabboti. Dutiyayojanāya
analyzed: ubho atthe adhiggaṇhāti tasmai āyu ādīni patthayantena appamādaḥ uva kātabbaḥ iti dutiya yojanāya

original: pana paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti. Kattha? Puññakiriyāsu. Kasmāti ce? Appamattotiādi.
analyzed: pana paṇḍitāḥ appamādam pasaṃsanti kattha puñña kiriyāsu kasmā iti ce appamatta utiādi

original: Tenāha “yasmā…pe… attho”ti. Atthapaṭilābhāti diṭṭhadhammikādihitapaṭilābhā.
analyzed: tena āha attho ti attha paṭilābhā ati diṭṭhadhammika ādi hita paṭilābhā

original: Appamādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: appamāda sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 8. Kalyāṇamittasuttavaṇṇanā
129. Sīlādiguṇasamannāgato kalyāṇo bhaddako mitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto, tassa dhammo
analyzed: sīla ādi guṇa samannāgato kalyāṇaḥ bhaddakaḥ mitto etassa ati kalyāṇa mitto tassa dhammo

original: kalyāṇamittasseva svākhāto nāma hoti sutvā kattabbakiccassa sādhanato. Tenāha “atthaṃ
analyzed: kalyāṇamittassa iva svākhātaḥ nāma hoti sutvā kattabba kiccassa sādhanato tena āha attham

original: pūretī”ti. Itarassāti pāpamittassa. Tenāti atthapūraṇena. Etanti “so ca kho kalyāṇamittassā”ti
analyzed: pūreti iti itarassa ati pāpa mittassa tena ati attha pūraṇena etat ti saḥ ca kho kalyāṇa mittassa ati

original: etaṃ vacanaṃ. Desanādhammoti pariyattidhammo. So hi kalyāṇamittato paccakkhato laddhabbo,
analyzed: etam vacanam desanā dhammo ti pariyatti dhammo so hi kalyāṇa mittato paccakkhataḥ laddhabbo

original: itare tadupanissayā paccattapurisakārehi, tena laddhabbo kalyāṇamittoti evamattho
analyzed: itare tad upanissayā paccatta purisakārehi tena laddhabbaḥ kalyāṇa mittaḥ ti evamattho

original: gahetabbo. Sāvakabodhisattavasena hesā desanā āgatā. Na hi sesabodhisattānaṃ paropadesena payojanaṃ atthi.
analyzed: sāvaka bodhisatta vasena ha isā desanā āgatā na hi sesa bodhisattānam para upadesena payojanam atthi

original: Upaḍḍhaṃ kalyāṇamittatoti brahmacariyaṃ carantassa upaḍḍhaguṇo kalyāṇamittato laddhabbo.
analyzed: upaḍḍham kalyāṇa mittataḥ ti brahmacariyam carantassa upaḍḍha guṇaḥ kalyāṇa mittataḥ laddhabbo

original: Upaḍḍhaṃ paccattapurisakāratoti itaraṃ upaḍḍhaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭipajjantassa attano purisakārato.
analyzed: upaḍḍham paccatta purisakārato ti itaram upaḍḍham ñāṇam paṭipajjantassa attano purisakārato

original: Lokepi pākaṭoyamattho “ācariyato upaḍḍhaṃ, paccattapurisakārato upaḍḍhaṃ laddhabbā
analyzed: loke pi pākaṭaḥ yam atthaḥ ācariyataḥ upaḍḍham paccatta purisakārataḥ upaḍḍham laddhabbā

original: tevijjatā”ti, tasmā thero tathā cintesi. Nippadesanti anavasesato. Tatoti kalyāṇamittato.
analyzed: tasmā thero tathā cintesi anavasesato tato ti kalyāṇa mittato

original: Upaḍḍhaṃ āgacchatīti upaḍḍhaguṇo paṭipajjantaṃ upagacchati. Bahūhi purisehi. Vinibbhogo
analyzed: upaḍḍham āgacchati iti upaḍḍha guṇaḥ paṭipajjantam upagacchati bahūhi purisehi vinibbhogaḥ

original: vivecanaṃ natthi ekajjhaṃ atthassa vivecetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Esāti paratoghosapaccattapurisakārato
analyzed: vivecanam natthi ekajjham atthassa vivecetum a sakkuṇeyya ttā esā ati paratoghosa paccatta purisakārato

original: ca sijjhamāno attho. Ettakanti ettako bhāgo. Yadi na sakkā laddhuṃ, atha kasmā upaḍḍhanti
analyzed: ca sijjhamānaḥ atthaḥ ettakanti ettakaḥ bhāgaḥ yadi na sakkā laddhum atha kasmai

original: vuttanti āha “kalyāṇamittatāyā”tiādi. Sammādiṭṭhiādīsu na sakkā laddhuṃ. Asakkuṇeyye
analyzed: vuttam iti āha kalyāṇa mitta tāya atiādi sammādiṭṭhi ādīsu na sakkā laddhum a sakkuṇeyye

original: sakalampi na sambhavati paratoghosamattena tesaṃ asijjhanato, padhānahetubhāvadīpanatthaṃ
analyzed: sakalam pi na sambhavati paratas ghosa mattena tesam padhāna hetu bhāva dīpana attham

original: pana “sakalamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Pubbabhāgapaṭilābhaṅganti pubbabhāge paṭiladdhabbakāraṇaṃ
analyzed: pana sakalam evā ti vuttam pubba bhāga paṭilābhaṅganti pubba bhāge paṭiladdhabba kāraṇam

original: kalyāṇamittassa upadesena vinā tena uttari visesato aladdhabbato. Atthatoti paramatthato.
analyzed: kalyāṇamittassa upadesena vinā tena uttari visesataḥ a laddhabbataḥ atthataḥ ti paramatthataḥ

original: “Kalyāṇamittaṃ…pe… cattāro khandhā”ti vatvā sutvāti attho. Te pana sīlādayo saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannāti
analyzed: cattāro khandhā ti vatvā sutvā ati attho te pana sīla ādayo saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpannā ti

original: āha “saṅkhārakkhandhotipi vadantiyevā”ti.
analyzed: āha saṅkhāra kkhandhaḥ ti pi vadantiyā iva iti

original: Māhevanti mā aha evanti chedo, ahāti nipātamattaṃ, māti paṭisedhe nipāto. Tenāha
analyzed: māhevanti mā aha evanti chedaḥ tena āha

original: “mā evaṃ abhaṇī”ti. “Māhevaṃ ānandā”ti vadato bhagavato imasmiṃ ṭhāne tādisassa nāma
analyzed: evam abhaṇi iti ānanda ati vadataḥ bhagavataḥ imasmin ṭhāne tādisassa nāma

original: te, ānanda, kalyāṇamittaguṇe sevato vattuṃ yuttaṃ ayāthāvatoti dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa
analyzed: te ānanda kalyāṇa mitta guṇe sevataḥ vattum yuttam a yāthāvataḥ ti dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa

original: yathābhūtaguṇakittanamukhena paṭikkhepo yuttoti dassento “bahussuto”tiādimāha. Idanti
analyzed: yathā bhūta guṇa kittana mukhena paṭikkhepaḥ yuttaḥ ti dassentaḥ bahussutaḥ iti ādim āha idam ti

original: idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā āhāti sambandho. Sakalameva hīti ettha hi-saddo hetuattho. Tena
analyzed: idam vacanam bhagavā āha ati sambandhaḥ sakalam eva hi iti ettha hi saddaḥ hetu atthaḥ tena

original: “māheva”nti tassa paṭikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ jotitaṃ, na sarūpato vuttaṃ. “Kalyāṇamittasseta”ntiādinā
analyzed: tassa paṭikkhepassa kāraṇam jotitam na sarūpataḥ vuttam kalyāṇa mittassa etat ti ādinā

original: pana taṃ sarūpato dassitanti āha “idāni…pe… ādimāhā”ti. Pāṭikaṅkhitabbanti icchanaṭṭhena
analyzed: pana tam sarūpataḥ dassitanti āha idānipe ādim āha ati pāṭikaṅkhitabbam ti icchana ṭṭhena

original: pāṭikaṅkhitabbaṃ, na paṭikaṅkhānimittenāti āha “avassaṃbhāvīti attho”ti.
analyzed: pāṭikaṅkhitabbam na paṭikaṅkhā nimittena ati āha avassaṃbhāvi iti atthaḥ ti

original: Idhāti antogadhāvadhāraṇapadaṃ, idhevāti attho. Imasmiṃyeva hi sāsane ariyamaggabhāvanā,
analyzed: idha ati idha iva ati atthaḥ imasmin yā iva hi sāsane ariya magga bhāvanā

original: na aññattha. Ādipadānaṃyevāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vākye ādito eva vuttasammādiṭṭhiādipadānaṃyeva.
analyzed: na aññatthe ādi padānaṃ iva ati tasmim tasmim vākye āditas eva vutta sammādiṭṭhi ādi padānaṃ iva

original: Sammādassanalakkhaṇāti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena sammadeva
analyzed: sammā dassana lakkhaṇā ti catunnam ariya saccānam pariññā abhisamaya ādi vasena sammat eva

original: dassanasabhāvā. Sammāabhiropanalakkhaṇoti nibbānasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe sampayuttadhamme
analyzed: dassana sabhāvā sammā abhiropana lakkhaṇo ti nibbāna saṅkhāte ārammaṇe sampayutta dhamme

original: sammadeva āropanasabhāvo. Sammāpariggahaṇalakkhaṇāti musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya
analyzed: sammat eva āropana sabhāvaḥ musāvāda ādīnam visaṃvādana ādi kicca tāya

original: lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato pariggāhakasabhāvā sammāvācā siniddhabhāvena
analyzed: lūkhānam a pariggāhakānam paṭipakkha bhāvataḥ pariggāhaka sabhāvā sammā vācā siniddha bhāvena

original: sampayuttadhamme sammāvācāpaccayaṃ subhāsitasotārañca puggalaṃ pariggaṇhātīti sammāpariggahaṇalakkhaṇā.
analyzed: sampayutta dhamme sammā vācā paccayam subhāsita sotāram ca puggalam pariggaṇhāti iti sammā pariggahaṇa lakkhaṇā

original: Yathā kāyikakiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hoti,
analyzed: yathā kāyika kiriyā kiñci kattabbam samuṭṭhāpeti sayam ca samuṭṭhahanam ghaṭanam hoti

original: tathā sammākammanta saṅkhātā viratipīti samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇā daṭṭhabbā, sampayuttadhammānaṃ
analyzed: tathā sammā kammanta saṅkhātā virati pīti samuṭṭhāpana lakkhaṇā daṭṭhabbā sampayutta dhammānam

original: vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhāpanaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya. Jīvamānassa sattassa,
analyzed: vā ukkhipanam samuṭṭhāpanam kāyika kiriyāya bhārukkhipanam viya jīvamānassa sattassa

original: sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā, jīvitappavattiyā ājīvasseva vā suddhi vodānaṃ. Yathā uppannuppannānaṃ
analyzed: sampayutta dhammānam vā jīvita pavattiyā ājīvassa iva vā suddhi vodānam yathā uppanna uppannānam

original: vajjānaṃ dhammena pahānānuppādaatthalābhādiparivuḍḍhi hoti, evaṃ sampayuttānaṃ paggahaṇasabhāvoti
analyzed: vajjānam dhammena pahāna anuppāda attha lābha ādi parivuḍḍhi hoti evam sampayuttānam paggahaṇa sabhāvaḥ ti

original: sammāpaggahalakkhaṇo sammāvāyāmo. Kāyavedanācittadhammesu subhasukhaniccaattagāhānañca
analyzed: sammā paggaha lakkhaṇo sammāvāyāmo kāya vedanā citta dhammesu

original: vidhamanavasena sammāpatiṭṭhānasabhāvāti sammāupaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā sammāsati. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ
analyzed: vidhamana vasena sammā patiṭṭhāna sabhāvā ati sammā upaṭṭhāna lakkhaṇā sammā sati sampayutta dhammānam

original: sammā samādahanaṃ ekaggatākaraṇaṃ sabhāvo etassāti sammāsamādhānalakkhaṇo sammāsamādhi.
analyzed: sammā samādahanam ekagga tā karaṇam sabhāvaḥ etassa ati sammā samādhāna lakkhaṇaḥ sammāsamādhi

original: Tīṇi kiccāni honti paṭipakkhadhammesu, ārammaṇadhammesu, sampayuttadhammesu ca ekasmiṃyeva
analyzed: tīṇi kiccāni honti paṭipakkha dhammesu ārammaṇa dhammesu sampayutta dhammesu ca ekasmiṃ yeva

original: khaṇe pavattivisesabhūtāni. Idāni tāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “seyyathida”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: khaṇe pavatti visesa bhūtāni idāni tāni sarūpataḥ dassetum seyyathā idam tiādi vuttam

original: Saddhinti iminā “aññehī”ti vuttakilesā micchādiṭṭhiyā saha ekaṭṭhā vā anekaṭṭhā vāti
analyzed: saddhinti iminā aññehi iti vutta kilesā micchādiṭṭhiyā saha eka ṭṭhā vā aneka ṭṭhā vā ati

original: dasseti. Pajahati pahāya naṃ paṭivijjhati. Nirodhanti nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati.
analyzed: dasseti pajahati pahāya nam paṭivijjhati nirodhanti nibbānam ārammaṇam karoti sacchikiriyā paṭivedhena paṭivijjhati

original: Na kevalaṃ maggadhammā vuttanayeneva, atha kho aparenapi nayena veditabbāti dassento
analyzed: na kevalam magga dhammāḥ vutta nayena iva atha kho aparena api nayena veditabbā ti dassento

original: “apicā”tiādimāha. Nānākhaṇā punappunaṃ uppajjanato. Nānārammaṇā aniccānupassanādibhāvato.
analyzed: apica ati ādim āha nānā khaṇā punappunam uppajjanataḥ nānā ārammaṇā anicca anupassanā ādi bhāvataḥ

original: Ekakkhaṇā sakideva uppajjanato. Ekārammaṇā nibbānavisayattā. Cattāri nāmāni labhati
analyzed: eka khaṇā sakideva uppajjanataḥ eka ārammaṇā nibbāna visaya ttā cattāri nāmāni labhati

original: pariññābhisamayādivasena pavattiyā. Tīṇi nāmāni labhati kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ pahānavasena
analyzed: pariññā abhisamaya ādi vasena pavattiyā tīṇi nāmāni labhati kāma saṅkappa ādīnam pahāna vasena

original: pavattiyā. Paṭipakkhapahānavasena hissa nāmattayalābho. Esa nayo sesesupi. Viratiyopi
analyzed: pavattiyā paṭipakkha pahāna vasena hissa nāmattaya lābho esa nayo sesesu pi

original: honti cetanāyopi pubbabhāgepi vikkhambhanavasena pavattanato. Maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyova
analyzed: honti cetanāyaḥ pi pubba bhāge pi vikkhambhana vasena pavattanataḥ magga kkhaṇe pana viratiyā uva

original: paṭipakkhasamucchindanassa maggakiccattā. Na hi cetanā maggasabhāvā. Sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasenāti
analyzed: paṭipakkha samucchindanassa magga kicca ttā na hi cetanā magga sabhāvā sammappadhāna sati paṭṭhāna vasena ati

original: catubbidhasammappadhānacatubbidhasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhati anuppannākusalānuppādanādīnaṃ
analyzed: catubbidha sammappadhāna catubbidha sati paṭṭhāna vasena cattāri nāmāni labhati anuppanna akusala anuppādana ādīnam

original: kusalānañca vaḍḍhanato. Pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepīti yathā pubbabhāge paṭhamajjhānādivasena
analyzed: kusalānam ca vaḍḍhanato pubba bhāge pi magga kkhaṇe pi iti yathā pubba bhāge paṭhamajjhāna ādi vasena

original: nānā. Evaṃ maggakkhaṇepi. Na hi ekopi ca maggasamādhi paṭhamajjhānasamādhiādināmāni
analyzed: nānā evam magga kkhaṇe pi na hi ekaḥ api ca magga samādhi paṭhamajjhāna samādhi ādi nāmāni

original: labhati sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ viya kiccavasena bhedābhāvato. Tenāha “maggakkhaṇepi sammāsamādhiyevā”ti.
analyzed: labhati sammādiṭṭhi ādīnam viya kicca vasena bheda abhāvato tena āha magga kkhaṇe pi sammāsamādhiyā iva āti

original: Ñatvā ñātabbāti sambandho. Vuddhi nāma vepullaṃ bhiyyobhāvo punappunaṃ uppādo evāti
analyzed: ñatvā ñātabbā ati sambandhaḥ vuddhi nāma vepullam bhiyyobhāvaḥ punappunam uppādaḥ eva ati

original: āha “punappunaṃ janetī”ti. Abhinibbattetīti abhivaḍḍhaṃ pāpento nibbatteti. Vivittatāti
analyzed: āha punappunam janeti iti abhinibbatteti iti abhivaḍḍham pāpentaḥ nibbatteti vivitta tā ati

original: vivittabhāvo. So hi vivecanīyato viviccati, yaṃ viviccitvā ṭhitaṃ, tadubhayampi idha
analyzed: vivitta bhāvaḥ saḥ hi vivecanīyataḥ viviccati yam viviccitvā ṭhitam tat ubhayam pi idha

original: vivittabhāvasāmaññena “vivittatā”ti vuttaṃ. Tesu purimo vivecanīyato viviccamānatāya
analyzed: vivitta bhāva sāmaññena vivitta tā iti vuttam tesu purimaḥ vivecanīyataḥ viviccamāna tāya

original: viviccanakiriyāya samaṅgī dhammasamūho tāya eva viviccanakiriyāya vasena vivekoti
analyzed: viviccana kiriyāya samaṅgī dhamma samūho tāya eva viviccana kiriyāya vasena

original: gahito. Itaro sabbaso tato vivittasabhāvatāya. Tattha yasmiṃ dhammapuñje sammādiṭṭhi
analyzed: gahitaḥ itaraḥ sabbaso tatas vivitta sabhāva tāya tattha yasmin dhamma puñje sammādiṭṭhi

original: pavattati, taṃ yathāvuttāya viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātaṃ nissāyeva pavattati,
analyzed: pavattati tam yathā vuttāya viviccamāna tāya viveka saṅkhātam nissāya iva pavattati

original: itaraṃ pana taṃninnatātaṃārammaṇatāhīti vuttaṃ “vivekaṃ nissitaṃ, viveke vā nissita”nti.
analyzed: itaram pana vuttam vivekam nissitam viveke vā nissitam ti

original: Yathā vā vivekavasena pavattaṃ jhānaṃ “vivekaja”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ vivekavasena pavattā
analyzed: yathā vā viveka vasena pavattam jhānam viveka janti vuttam evam viveka vasena pavattā

original: sammādiṭṭhi “vivekanissitā”ti daṭṭhabbā. Nissayo ca vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena maggaphalānaṃ
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhi viveka nissitā ti daṭṭhabbā nissayaḥ ca vipassanā maggānam vasena magga phalānam

original: veditabbo. Asatipi tāsaṃ pubbāparabhāve “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti ettha paccayānaṃ samuppādanaṃ
analyzed: veditabbaḥ asati pi tāsam pubba apara bhāve paṭiccasamuppādaḥ ti ettha paccayānam samuppādanam

original: viya abhinnadhammādhārā nissayabhāvanā sambhavanti. Tassa tadaṅga-samucchedanissaraṇavivekanissitataṃ
analyzed: viya abhinna dhamma ādhārā nissaya bhāvanā sambhavanti tassa tad aṅga samuccheda nissaraṇa viveka nissita tataṃ

original: vatvā paṭippassaddhivivekanissitatāya avacanaṃ ariyamaggabhāvanāya vuccamānattā.
analyzed: vatvā paṭippassaddhi viveka nissita tāya avacanam ariya magga bhāvanāya vuccamāna ttā

original: Bhāvitamaggassa hi ye sacchikātabbā dhammā. Tesaṃ kiccaṃ paṭippassaddhiviveko. Ajjhāsayatoti

original: Atidevapattopi pañcakhandhūpadhīnaṃ atthitāya kilesūpadhiādīnaṃyeva virahitabhāvo
